levelList.name: Remordimiento
levelList.desc: [BeforeAttack] Remove 1 random removable negative effect applied to self

coindescs.desc: [OnSucceedAttack] Inflige +2 Tremor Count; Inflict (Wrath A-Reson. /3) additional Tremor Count
[OnSucceedAttack] Provoca Estallido de Tremor

levelList.name: Remordimiento
levelList.desc: [BeforeAttack] Remove 1 random removable negative effect applied to self

coindescs.desc: [OnSucceedAttack] Inflige +2 Tremor Count; Inflict (Wrath A-Reson. /3) additional Tremor Count

[OnSucceedAttack] Trigger Estallido de Tremor
If the target does not have a Stagger Threshold upon Estallido de Tremor,
Deal Wrath Damage by (6 + 2x(Wrath A-Reson.))% of the final Stagger Threshold raised

levelList.name: Remordimiento
levelList.desc: [BeforeAttack] Remove 2 random removable negative effects applied to self

coindescs.desc: [OnSucceedAttack] Inflige +3 Tremor Count; Inflict (Wrath A-Reson. /3) additional Tremor Count

[OnSucceedAttack] Trigger Estallido de Tremor
If the target does not have a Stagger Threshold upon Estallido de Tremor,
Deal Wrath Damage by (12 + 3x(Wrath A-Reson.))% of the final Stagger Threshold raised.

levelList.name: Remordimiento
levelList.desc:
[CantIdentify]
Targets Randomly
[BeforeAttack] If this unit has a negative status effect, Atk Weight +1

coindescs.desc:
[OnSucceedAttack] Trigger Estallido de Tremor.
Amount of Stagger Threshold raised by Estallido de Tremor increases by 30% of Tremor on target.
Reduce Tremor Count by 1
[EndSkill] Gana 3 Bind and 1 Blunt Power Up next turn.

levelList.name: Remordimiento
levelList.desc:
[CantIdentify]
Targets Randomly
[BeforeAttack] If this unit has a negative status effect, Atk Weight +1

coindescs.desc:
[OnSucceedAttack] Trigger Estallido de Tremor
Amount of Stagger Threshold raised by Estallido de Tremor increases by 40% of Tremor on target.
If the target does not have a Stagger Threshold upon Estallido de Tremor,
Deal Wrath Damage by (6 + 2x(Wrath A-Reson.))% of the final Stagger Threshold raised
Reduce Tremor Count by 1
[EndSkill] Gana 3 Bind and 1 Blunt Power Up next turn.

levelList.name: Remordimiento

coindescs.desc:
[OnSucceedAttack] Trigger Estallido de Tremor
Amount of Stagger Threshold raised by Estallido de Tremor increases by 50% of Tremor on target.
If the target does not have a Stagger Threshold upon Estallido de Tremor,
Deal Wrath Damage by (12 + 3x(Wrath A-Reson.))% of the final Stagger Threshold raised
Reduce Tremor Count by 1
[EndSkill] Gana 3 Bind and 1 Blunt Power Up next turn.

levelList.name: Chirrido Eléctrico
levelList.desc:
[BeforeAttack] Gain +8 [Charge] Count
[EndSkill] Apply +8 [Charge] Count to 1 other ally with the least [Charge] Count
- Number of affected allies grows by (highest Envy Reson. - 2) (max 3)

coindescs.desc: [OnSucceedAttack] Inflict 3 [Burst]

levelList.name: Chirrido Eléctrico
levelList.desc:
[BeforeAttack] Gain +8 [Charge] Count
[EndSkill] Apply +8 [Charge] Count to 1 other ally with the least [Charge] Count
- Number of affected allies grows by (highest Envy Reson. - 2) (max 4)
- At 4+ (highest Envy Reson.), apply 1 [VioletDamageUp] to self and all affected allies

coindescs.desc: [OnSucceedAttack] Inflict 3 [Burst]

levelList.name: Chirrido Eléctrico

- At 4+ (highest Envy Reson.), apply 1 [VioletDamageUp] to self and all affected allies

levelList.name: Chirrido Eléctrico
levelList.desc:

[BeforeAttack] If this unit has 10+ [Charge] Count, spend up to 20 [Charge] Count; deal +2% more damage for every [Charge] Count consumed (max 40%)

coindescs.desc: [OnSucceedAttack] Inflict 1 [Paralysis]
